scripts.build-deps: yarn build-core && yarn build-backend-cpu && yarn build-backend-wasm && yarn build-backend-webgl && yarn build-converter && yarn build-layers && yarn build-data && yarn build-tfjs && yarn build-vis
scripts.build-tfjs: cd ../../../tfjs && yarn && yarn build && yarn build-npm
scripts.build-backend-wasm: cd ../../../tfjs-backend-wasm && yarn && yarn build && yarn build-npm
scripts.build-backend-webgl: cd ../../../tfjs-backend-webgl && yarn && yarn build && yarn build-npm
scripts.build-converter: cd ../../../tfjs-converter && yarn && yarn build && yarn build-npm
scripts.build-core: cd ../../../tfjs-core && yarn && yarn build && yarn build-npm
scripts.build-layers: cd ../../../tfjs-layers && yarn && yarn build && yarn build-npm
